text: @WhiteHouse @SenateGOP I'm sitting here trying to watch a briefing regarding the coronavirus & he just can't stop his c racy rantings. Let have a rally on TV & the audience can be the GOP so they can respond to his speech. American can watch his rally on TV like we do the briefings!
